title: Daily reminder to bring back Solo Q

replies.body: Daily upvote for daily reminder
how does Solo Queue even work? What's the difference between this and Dynamic Queue?

dynamic queue=play with people you know on voice chat against prople who are playing with strangers

solo queue=everyone play with strangers
what if I have friends that I legitimately just want to play with? not troll around, just want play with friends. and yes this is a serious question
you have normal game mode? It's literlly exact the same in game experience just without gaining or losing elo.

it's the exact same gaming experience except completely different.

Why do people pretend that players take normals and ranked the same level of serious when they themselves don't? People troll hard in normals, and give up super easily.

Because right now, ranked is just a glorified normal mode, because ranks are meaningless.

They are individual ratings, in a group environment. Its like evaluating whos the best chess player, by letting them drive around in racecars.
Wish I could upvote this more. Make me laugh too hard. :')

> [{quoted}](name=franticFurball,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=000600000000000100010000,timestamp=2016-06-30T20:22:52.479+0000)
>
> Because right now, ranked is just a glorified normal mode, because ranks are meaningless.
> 
> They are individual ratings, in a group environment. Its like evaluating whos the best chess player, by letting them drive around in racecars.

http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/slow_clap_citizen_kane.gif
Ever since the release of dynamic queue, ranked game had become normal mode, casual normal players rushing into dynamic queue drastically reducing the quality of games
Have you played normals? The mindset of people player are so extremely different that it is a different experience altogether.

lmao of course I have played normal.
only the difference of your own mindset would affect your experience.
pretty much the same as solo vs dynamic, same experience except you have it stuck in your head its different

Because its not the same?

Here is the main problem with dynamic, loss of ranked integrity.

Ranked integrity is ruined. Reasons?

1) You have premades and soloes in same matchups, and the solo player is always at a disatvantage at those times. Thus there is no fairness and one group of players always has an advantage, thus be able to rise even if their skill level is not that high. This creates skill discrepancy over all rankings which results in even more unfair mathups and failures in matchmaking because it cant accuratelly distinguish someones skill.

2) Even when premades are on your team, it is bad for the solo. Because it robs him of his team contribution. He will never contribute as 3 or 4 people will. Thus he has less decision power, less carrying power and is dependant not on his skill but on skill off his premade. This is especially bad when the solo is simply pushed out of the group and has to be playing pretty much alone.

3) All of this results in rampant LEGAL boosting. Previously, you could still boost, but it was 1 account at most. Now you can boost up to 4 people. Again, this makes the ranking not matter because noone can be sure, who was boosted and who was not. And noone is sure if the person who is playing with you or against you even deserves his rank.


All of this results in the diminishing worth of any rankings since it is not dependant on skill as much anymore and is made by far more variables that before (Making it more innaccurate). This also results in worse game quality as solo players become disadvantaged, while premades are empowered.

Thus ranked integrity, is gone.

solo players are higher elo than premade players in the same games to compensate

I really haven't noticed a difference pretty confident it's almost entirely in your head that ranked games are worse now

That does not compensate. Being premade is not compensted as easily as that. Especially since then eve MORE variables are added to ranked system making it even MORE innaccurate. 

And no, its not in my head, ranked games are worse, because ranked integrity is gone. If it isnt gone, refute all of my points and tell me how it is not gone.

Because currently ranked is a glorified normal mode.

Shockingly normal mode was always the same game as ranked lmao

The only complaint that has any merit at all is people can get boosted by smurfs more easily. Doesn't affect your ability to rank up though

> [{quoted}](name=Monado II,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=00060000000000010000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-07-01T19:26:50.167+0000)
>
> Shockingly normal mode was always the same game as ranked lmao
> 
> The only complaint that has any merit at all is people can get boosted by smurfs more easily. Doesn't affect your ability to rank up though

yes id does effect because even by riots own measurements groups rank up substanialy faster then solo players they have a advantage

> [{quoted}](name=Monado II,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=0006000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-01T02:19:49.917+0000)
>
> pretty much the same as solo vs dynamic, same experience except you have it stuck in your head its different

Actually Riot could keep solo and pre-made separated as two systems.

Then you play normals. Unless "tryharding" is beneath you, there should be no difference between that and ranked. Also, BTW, most of the people who want SoloQ back probably want 5-Man team ranked ladder back (where you can play with 4 friends, not 3, not 2, not 1, only with 4 friends).

That's not how it is...
if you're in a group that doesn't mean you are guaranteed to be in a voice chat. That, and it's not 5-man vs. Solos every single game. People need to learn that not every "mildly coordinated team" isn't a 5-man...

I am not saying all dynamic queue users use voice chat, I am just saying a lot of them do and it gives people unfair advantages.

Rito only showed data of 5man vs solo~3 man, but they hided all the 4man vs 2 man, 3man vs solo, etc. I am in silver and 3~4man vs solo~2man team happens quite often, in higher elo it just gets way worse.
how can it possibly get worse when in higher elo you can't even queue as 5 anymore (only 3)

because there are less player overall in higher ranked, therefore harder to find premade with same size and same elo. The system obviously don't want to give premades 5 hour queue time so it just pair them against solos.
kinda you could also duo queue
A duo have much less harmful impact to the game than a trio and quad.

Sorry Rito, we will not slowly forget about it.

Dynamic Garbage sucks. Bring back soloQ.
daily upvoting every soloQ post, thanks for your vailance
Who needs solo queue when we got badges!? /sarcasm

Woot! Another Solo Q post with 0 explanation as to why or reasoning for how this change would actually benefit the game more! Just another "I shouldn't have to say anymore because it's an assumption that 99% of everyone wants Solo Q back". Although those who are vocal wanted it back, that was a very small number of people compared to the total number of players for this game, and there's no way to determine what those who said nothing want. So in reality, your title should be changed from "bring back solo q" to  "i want solo q back" since you shouldn't be making assumptions for others.
Why would you explain the same thing over and over when everything was already said with zero rebuttal.

There was plenty of rebuttal. The main ones being that there are people out there who enjoy playing as a group, otherwise you would still see everyone playing solo (yes, some people "abuse" the advantage groups have but not everyone does it for that). That, and Solo Q was full of its own flaws, which when compared to Dynamic Q, some people say it's worth to keep dynamic queue.
We've made the same arguments so many times. If you're not gonna listen, we're not gonna post them and waste time. Just put a title to remind Riot.
But the same rebuttals have been given, and have not been listened to either. But if you don't want to make the same arguments, why even make the same post? Some of us used to enjoy the boards.

Most of the rebuttals I hear nowadays are "Riot said so" which is terrible because that should mean we have solo queue because "Riot said it was coming". And this is more of a post to Riot themselves because they actually think it's less than 1% of players who want SQ.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Fidori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=00050001000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-30T18:32:21.386+0000)
>
> But the same rebuttals have been given, and have not been listened to either. But if you don't want to make the same arguments, why even make the same post? Some of us used to enjoy the boards.

Fyi, champ select =/= Dynamic queue.

That's why you are defending Riot.

The new champion selection allows two choices of role.
The Dynamic Queue allows people to queue with 2 to 4 people.

Thew new champion selection is great.
The Dynamic Queue is trash.

Riot released these two system in one patch and made a Poll to show how people liked this new patch.
You are one of the victims of their attempt to make DQ covered under the benefits of new champion select.

I hope it clears up and helps you rethink about what you are defending.

If there's one thing I hate, it's people telling me what I think. I'm well aware of the difference between new champ select and dynamic queue, and have been on the boards enough to be thoroughly annoyed by people like you who think we can't tell the difference (so stop re-iterating that for attention). Hell, I'm not even defending anything. But until you can come at me with something more productive than "x is great, y is trash, because I said so", I will not stop trying inject some logic into the gross, over-exaggerated tragedy you've all turned this season into.

Speak only for yourself, but don't put words in my mouth.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Fidori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=0005000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-01T13:28:41.323+0000)
>
> If there's one thing I hate, it's people telling me what I think. I'm well aware of the difference between new champ select and dynamic queue, and have been on the boards enough to be thoroughly annoyed by people like you who think we can't tell the difference (so stop re-iterating that for attention). Hell, I'm not even defending anything. But until you can come at me with something more productive than "x is great, y is trash, because I said so", I will not stop trying inject some logic into the gross, over-exaggerated tragedy you've all turned this season into.
> 
> Speak only for yourself, but don't put words in my mouth.

We put these words into your mouth because confusion is the only legit reason for you to actually prefer the current ranking system, even if you have 4 friends always ready to queue with.

You can easily google for all the reasons you want. We are tired of reasoning. I can give you some keywords:

1. Incredibility of the Ranks (Invalid representation of performance)
2. Legalized Rank Boosting (1-to-4 basis)
3. Worsened Toxicity (Easily 4 vs 1)
4. Unfair tactical environment in terms of coordination.

Don't ask me for details. I think you can google them.

If something is wrong, we keep voicing it until it's fixed. You have no right to shut us up just because you want to view the board in your preference.

I never said I prefer this system. I said this system is about as bad as the old one, but has been largely exaggerated as League newest (and most severe) scapegoat. In order:

1. This is only true for those who abuse the system to boost. Soloing up still gives you an approximately accurate rank because it rates your performance against (most of the time) other solos and duos.

2. The system doesn't make boosting right, just inadvertently makes it more accessible.

3. Toxicity is equally as present as it used to be. 

4. Just about the only legitimate complaint about the new queue, which I understand.

I don't care if you shut up, cause you won't. But if people are gonna spam complaints, at least be rational.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Fidori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=000500010000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-06T13:38:57.893+0000)
>
> I never said I prefer this system. I said this system is about as bad as the old one, but has been largely exaggerated as League newest (and most severe) scapegoat. In order:
> 
> 1. This is only true for those who abuse the system to boost. Soloing up still gives you an approximately accurate rank because it rates your performance against (most of the time) other solos and duos.
> 
> 2. The system doesn't make boosting right, just inadvertently makes it more accessible.
> 
> 3. Toxicity is equally as present as it used to be. 
> 
> 4. Just about the only legitimate complaint about the new queue, which I understand.
> 
> I don't care if you shut up, cause you won't. But if people are gonna spam complaints, at least be rational.

1. I don't understand. Are you saying that the ranks are calculated through performance instead of win/loss now?

2. Can't say you are wrong. Just different ways of wording though.

3. I agree toxicity was already bad enough. However, you can't deny the fact that 4 friends can be toxic all together if just one of them starts rolling. The bullying problem has also been worsened because instead of 2 bot duos flaming everyone else, now you may have 4 others cherry picking your 1 missed last-hit.

4. Glad you agree with this point.

Not that we don't want to be rational, but rarely decent people like you show up. I am glad you held this kind of attitude while replying to me. Usually people keep asking for reasons and still mix up DQ and NCS, which is the last argument we want to hear about why we should keep DQ. Thanks for the respect.

> [{quoted}](name=MadCast Fenris,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0Zs8dfyg,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2016-06-30T18:14:23.702+0000)

The new Champion Select would have fixed the issues of Yolo Queue.   That's all we needed.  Fyi, champ select =/= Dynamic queue.

nope.
I can forgive you, but your point is false on the grounds of knowledge of teambuilder. you know, that old system. where the queue times were ridiculous. because there were no supports.

without dynamic you can't have the new champ select without 10 more minutes being tacked onto queue times.

fyi, that argument is stupid.

and your stupid for making it.

Because you forgetting a lot of things.

and your point doesn't matter. at all. and nothing you typed is useful, in any way.

You need to understand that one system can only work with the other system. on the pbe it was fine to only have one, but on live with a less varied group it is not possible.

Then explain and argument, or just like every dynamic defender you cant?

Dynamic can work without the new champ select, and the champ select can work without dynamic, they are separate systems.

If they are not, can you explain why Hots had dynamic but didnt have this kind of champ select? If they are the same thing?

Dynamic defenders can't, and probably shouldn't, because anti dynamic already need to ignore things just to exist.

If riot with their statistics and professional analysis can't tell you that you're wrong, what hope do I have.

Anti dyna has already lost. your points are pointless, and without basis. literally all of them, lest you can show to me ONE that exists on a proper field.
Then explain HOW the points are pointless and how the arguments are wrong and what is ignored. That is how a discussion works!

I guess you are still confused.

Check your own words:
"I can forgive you, but your point is false on the grounds of knowledge of teambuilder. you know, that old system. where the queue times were ridiculous. because there were no supports.

without dynamic you can't have the new champ select without 10 more minutes being tacked onto queue times."

You were confusing the two.
The new champion selection reduces queue time because it lets people choose two roles.
DQ has nothing to do with queue time, except it may only lengthen the wait, as it now has an additional condition where the system tries to pair teams in an equal amount of pre-made members/groups as stated in 6.2.

You saying that DQ reduces queue time showed your confusion.

> One more thing. from here on I expect to see people that post that also post the sources with it. start  doing that.

You didn't do that for your claim that the two systems must stack together either, so I wouldn't bother.
Funny how people stick to the rules they don't obey.

BTW your claim that the two systems would work separated in PBE only supported how we can remove DQ with the new champion selection retained.
